document_data.title: The Fall of Highwatch
document_data.author: [[Mark Sehestedt]]
document_data.followed_by: ''[[Hand of the Hunter (novel)|Hand of the Hunter]]''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Fall of Highwatch''''' is the first book in the [[Chosen of Nendawen trilogy]] by [[Mark Sehestedt]]. It takes places about a century after the events of ''[[Frostfell]]''.
